definition: West China (region in the upper reaches of Yangtze River and Sichuan Province)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Huaxi Village in Jiangsu Province 江蘇省|江苏省[Jiang1 su1 Sheng3]
(bird species of China) alpine leaf warbler (Phylloscopus occisinensis)

sentences.english: The village now attracts businesses interested in shipping, steel, tobacco and textiles.
sentences.chinese: 現在華西村開始開發船運，鋼鐵，菸草和紡織業。

sentences.english: The village is no stranger to curious projects either.
sentences.chinese: 在華西村，各種奇奇怪怪的工程也不少見。

sentences.english: The party secretary says he wants to turn the "city village" of Huaxi into a Shangri-la.
sentences.chinese: 他表示自己想把華西村建設成香格里拉。

sentences.english: She was receiving treatment in Huaxi Hospital in Chengdu. Her conditions were not immediately available.
sentences.chinese: 她被安置在成都華西醫院治療，傷情目前還不清楚。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the characteristic of publication of West China Journal of Stomatology (WCJS).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析《華西口腔醫學雜誌》的載文特點。

sentences.english: Huaxi holds regular training sessions for village officials from across China.
sentences.chinese: 華西定期爲來自全國的村官召開培訓課。

sentences.english: It worked so well that Huaxi has become the richest village in China.
sentences.chinese: 現在華西村已經變成中國最富裕的村莊了。

sentences.english: They envy us for the fortune brought by Huaxi.
sentences.chinese: 他們羨慕華西帶給我們的財富。

sentences.english: Until recently, Huaxi was a poor farming community, typical of eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 從前，華西村不過是個典型的華東貧困村莊。

sentences.english: You can go to the West China Hospital.
New houses stand in Huaxi village, China's richest village in Jiangsu province.
sentences.chinese: 中國最富裕的村莊華西村，新民居鱗次櫛比。

sentences.english: Until recently, Huaxi was a poor farming community in Jiangsu province.
sentences.chinese: 不久之前，華西村還只是江蘇省一個貧困的農業村。

sentences.english: Huaxi Village, located east of the city of Jiangyin, in Jiangsu province, claims to be the richest village in China.
sentences.chinese: 華西村位於江蘇省江陰市東部，是中國最富裕的村莊。

sentences.english: Yes. Snake Alley is a very famous street in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 華西街是臺北很有名的一條街。

sentences.english: The Pathology Department of West China Hospital, Sichuan University, is one of the largest pathology departments in China.
sentences.chinese: 四川大學華西醫院病理科是全國最大的病理科之一。

definition: Henry Ying-tung Fok (1913-2006), Hong Kong tycoon with close PRC connections

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2
Shang4 hai3 Jiao1 tong1 Da4 xue2

definition: Pei Ieoh Ming or I.M. Pei (1917-2019), Chinese-American architect
Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党/same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙
the Jockey Club, Hong Kong philanthropic organization (and former gentleman's club)
Premier Zhou Enlai 周恩來|周恩来 (1898-1976)
Chen-Ning Franklin Yang (1922-), theoretical physicist, co-developer of Yang-Mills gauge theory, 1957 Nobel laureate
